plot: Joni Mitchell, Canada's queen of folk/pop, performs before an intimate audience on the Warner's Lot in Los Angeles. Playing in the round with a small band she delivers tracks from across her career including all her best loved songs.
title: Joni Mitchell: Painting with Words and Music
plot_es: Joni Mitchell, Canada's queen of folk/pop, performs before an intimate audience on the Warner's Lot in Los Angeles. Playing in the round with a small band she delivers tracks from across her career including all her best loved songs.
original_name: Joni Mitchell: Painting with Words and Music
